subject: Horse Racing
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: During his bid for the Triple Crown, the colt has amassed a huge following, although the biggest fans are probably the people inside his barn.
